page.title: 06A DAY IN MY LIFE IN 1985.
page.content: On Tuesday I woke up at 6. 45 and I found out that my dad was not going to work. I got my clothes and put them in my bedroom then I went down stairs and my mum had made me some toast and coffee. When I had eaten my breakfast I went back up stairs, had a wash, brushed my teeth then I went into my bedroom.I got dressed then I came down and brushed my hair then I finished my drink It was 8. 20 so I watched the television till 8. 35. When it was time to go I said good bye to my mum and dad then I went and called for Louise and we went to school. At schoolfirst we did maths, then we went into the hall, then we came out of the hall and I did three S.M.P cards. We did S.M.P. till 10. 30 which was playtime. At playtime I played rounders with Ruth, Hazel, Ann
